title: Millie Bobby Brown Just Went Blonde
text:
From ELLE

Three's a trend, and Millie Bobby Brown makes four. The Stranger Things actress is the latest star to completely change her hair this fall season. She's blonde now with a lob, though she did flirt with long brown hair shortly before.

Two Miami salons shared photos of Brown's two hair transformations yesterday, though when they were actually done is unclear.

It appears Brown went and got extensions first just for kicks. Dafne Evangelista Beauty Lounge shared three Instagrams of Brown yesterday smiling with her new 'do. In the one video they shared, Brown gushed, 'I have hair for the first time in four years, so it’s good.' (Brown shaved her head for her role as Eleven in Stranger Things. She has since been growing her hair out.)

But then, Brown decided to change her look again. YSV Salon shared a photo of Brown on its Instagram yesterday too, extensions out, going blonde. So Brown is no longer a brunette...for now. Stranger Things hasn't been confirmed for a fourth season yet, but should it be, she'll likely return to brown for her role as Eleven.









Who else has completely changed their hair this fall? Several people: Selena Gomez debuted super long hair, Mila Kunis went out with blonde and teal hair, and Rihanna got bangs.

A fifth—albeit more subtle—hair change? Hilary Duff, who went Lizzie McGuire blonde. She'll be shooting a reboot of the series, which will feature her Disney Channel sitcom character as a 30-year-old, for Disney's new streaming service, Disney+.

description: Eleven with the wig, only make it permanent
